scenario_text.value:
Taking on Miu’s shape to attack us—how low
can you get?!
Yeah... I can’t stand these guys.
Still... Where’s the real Miu, then?
Ah, Takuma! There, there, under the desk!
That’s...Miu!
Miu! Shakomon! Wake up, you two!
Nn...ohh... Ta...kuma?
Huh...?
Good, looks like these are the real ones.

My head’s all fuzzy. We were shown this weird
vision for ages and ages.
It was...a dream?
Miu? You okay?

I...saw everyone from the amusement park...
And they were all so mad...

Miu! It’s okay... You’re okay! It was just
a bad dream...
Yeah...

(The amusement park... She must mean the ones
she couldn’t save.)

(Miu must have seen something awful. Just
like how I saw Ryo and Shuuji.)
(She’s shaking...)

Miu, Shakomon, you shouldn’t push yourselves.
I’ll look for the others.
Okay... I don’t think I can move yet...

I’ll keep an eye on her, so please... Take
care of the others, will you?

Yeah, leave it to us! You two just rest,
okay?

We should be able to find the real Miu and
the rest of our friends soon!

Yeah... I bet they’re all dealing with their
own problems right about now!
